publications: [{"title":"Cost Analyzer Tool to Calculate Per-User Costs for Different Cloud Service Providers","date":"February 22, 2022","description":"The novel solution is a cost analyzer tool to calculate per-user costs for different cloud service providers. The proposed system provides the user an option to calculate the per-user costs via the graphical user interface (GUI) version or by implementing the zero-interaction version based on serverless services."},{"title":"Designing of an application for group based coordination for information exchange in Ad-hoc networks","subtitle":"ResearchGate","date":"Oct 2017","description":"In this paper, we design, implement and evaluate an application for group based coordination for information exchange in Ad-hoc networks. The design goal of the application is to develop a light weight and high accuracy connection system for mobile phones. It leverages both the Ad-Hoc network and the Wi-Fi interface at the kernel-level of smartphones to achieve high connectivity. Each user's smartphone works autonomously as a connector for extending the reach. We implement and evaluated the complete application using commercial off-the-shelf smartphones. Our result shows that application can achieve connectivity upto a radius of 10 ft for more than 90% of the time for both indoor and outdoor environments."}]
